Originally composer Wendy Carlos had scored music for the iconic Light Cycle scene in Disney’s Tron (1982), but the decision was made to let the scene play without music, thus letting the film’s incredible sound design take centre stage alongside the then cutting edge CG effects.  https://t.co/1myKKvTka8
